I was very surprised at this top...very cute and the colors are fabulous...fabric is nice and the design is perfect!! This kimono is pretty, light and airy.  However, I ordered a large so that it would be flowy on me and knowing the material wouldn't have much stretch. After losing a ton of weight, my upper arms - aka my batwings - are out of control, and I haven't worn short sleeves all summer because of it.  I had a bunch of events coming up in the heat of summer where I knew I needed something cool but with coverage.  I tried ALL THE COVERUPS and they were all too sheer, sleeves not long enough, too long overall, too thick, etc.I happened across this one in a suggested items list and gave it a go.  It was PERFECT.  Super cute over a cami, lightweight, ties in front, very cute flared back.  I wore it to a concert and got many compliments!
This can dress up or be an everyday look for any outfit! It fit as expected and I’m going to buy another one!

评论概述: Go with your gut on the size!!
评论详情: Reference: Purchased Medium, 5'2", 140lbs, 34DDD  After reading all the reviews, I decided on a medium, but I should have listened to my gut and purchased my normal size for tops Large.  I bought it for a trip, so I had to return it right away... it didn't quite tie closed enough like the model but I did love it and it matched my army pants perfectly. It's just the thing to dress up a "plain" outfit in South GA, adds fun and flirty aspect, light enough that it literally doesn't add one degree of additional warmth and bonus, hides my jiggly batwings (I recently lost 20lbs) so I will be reordering a large soon enough!! I do recommend!

评论概述: This short gal can wear this type of "vest" after all!
评论详情: I purchased the pink to wear over a pink t-shirt and jeans. I love the pattern of the fabric and the length of it which is perfect even on my short 5' tall frame. I find most things like this to be too long for me, but this one is cut in such a way that even a short person will look good in it. The fabric is "silky" and not cotton-like but that made it perfect for rolling up and packing into my suitcase to travel. When I pulled it out it was not wrinkled at all. The fact that it requires no ironing makes it a winner for me. I am tempted to purchase it in a few more colors. If you normally think you look awkward in these types of "vests" try this one!
Light weight flowy, comfy, really cute short kimono.
